title: Ocean Week 2017
body:
_"How can I track my contribution?
You’ll be able to see the total amount of points that you’ve individually contributed through the client."_


Can someone show me where this is because I can't find it anywhere in the client.
By the way I would like to know my contribution.

replies.body:
Hey, 

You can see it in the updated client under this tab 

http://i.imgur.com/PBsLUUg.png

Or you can see here - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017

pts = HP

Thank you.

All makes sense now.
